means: Rehabilitation of Addicts by Relatives and Employers 工作狂
ram-air-rocket engine 冲压空气火箭发动机
Rare Animal Relief Effort 稀有动物保护成果

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"稀罕的，很少发生"之意。
means: occasional ： 指偶然、不时或间或发生的事，侧重无规律可循。
uncommon ： 指一般不发生或很少发生的事情，故显得独特、异常与例外。
scare ： 指暂时不易发现、不存在或数量不足，供不应求的东西。
rare ： 指难得发生的事或难遇见的人或事，侧重特殊性。

sentence.Network_en: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
sentence.Network_cn: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

sentence.Network_en: It was a rare pleasure to see him in action.
As we approached the summit we were vouchsafed a rare vision.
sentence.Network_cn: 快到山顶时，我们有幸看到了难得一见的景象。

地球的英语怎么说_百度知道 ... radiolarian earth 【地质】放射虫土 rare earths 稀土族, 稀土泵素 refining earth 精制用的白土.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'widely spaced, infrequent'): from Latin rarus
late 18th cent.: variant of obsolete rear 'half-cooked' (used to refer to soft-boiled eggs, from the mid 17th to mid 19th cents)

entry.def: Something that is rare is not common and is therefore interesting or valuable.

example.ex: ...the black-necked crane, one of the rarest species in the world...
example.tran: 黑颈鹤，世界最稀有的物种之一

entry.def: An event or situation that is rare does not occur very often.

example.ex: ...on those rare occasions when he did eat alone...
example.tran: 在那些极其少见的、他的确单独吃饭的时候

example.ex: Heart attacks were extremely rare in babies, he said...
example.tran: 婴儿极少有心脏病发作的情况，他说。

entry.def: You use rare to emphasize an extremely good or remarkable quality.

example.ex: Ferris has a rare ability to record her observations on paper...
example.tran: 费里斯具备把自己的观察结果记录下来的超强能力。

example.ex: It was a rare pleasure to see him in action.

entry.def: Meat that is rare is cooked very lightly so that the inside is still red.

example.ex: Thick tuna steaks are eaten rare, like beef...
example.tran: 像牛肉一样，厚的金枪鱼排做到半熟即可食用。

example.ex: Waiter, I specifically asked for this steak rare.
example.tran: 服务员，我特别强调了这块牛排要做得嫩些。

means.word_mean: 1. not widely known; especially valued for its uncommonness;

sentences.sentence: "rare patches of gree in the desert"

means.word_mean: 4. marked by an uncommon quality; especially superlative or extreme of its kind;

sentences.sentence: "what is so rare as a day in June"-J.R.Lowell
"she was kind to an uncommon degree"

means.word_mean: 6. (of meat) cooked a short time; still red inside;

list.explanation: 不寻常的人，罕见的人(常指有罕见才智的)

example.zh: 她是一位不寻常的才女。

auth_sentence.content: It's a rare plaintive moment amid the fury.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a rare plaintive moment amid the fury.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's a rare plaintive moment amid the fury.

auth_sentence.content: The lowlights on The English Riviera are thankfully rare.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lowlights on The English Riviera are thankfully rare.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lowlights on The English Riviera are thankfully rare.

auth_sentence.content: Music making of this quality is all too rare.
auth_sentence.res_content: Music making of this quality is all too rare.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Music making of this quality is all too rare.

Sentence.sentence: Some scientistsmaintain that the changes we are seeing fall within the range of random (无规律的) variation—some years are cold, others warm, and we have just had an unremarkable string of warm yearsrecently—but that is becoming an increasingly rare interpretation in the face of continued and increasing warm conditions.
Physical books will surely become much rarer in the marketplace.
Affordable housing is rare in this city.
It's a rare chance for them to see the boss lose face.
Obama is but a rare example of black's excellence

means.word_mean: 罕见的, 珍贵的,很少发生的,少见的

sentences.en: It is a temple of rare architectural beauty.
sentences.cn: 论建筑之美, 那是一座极少有的寺院。

sentences.en: It is rare to see a man over 160 years old.
sentences.cn: 很少见到一个人能活到160岁。

sentences.en: The air is rare at high altitudes.
We have a rare old time at the party.
sentences.cn: 我们在聚会中尽情欢乐。

jushi.english: Your son is a rare man.
jushi.chinese: 你儿子是个了不起的人。

jushi.english: He shows rare ability in this direction.
jushi.chinese: 他在这方面有非凡的才能。
